title: Post Game: Putin headed for a ‘large-scale invasion’ of Ukraine
description: As Russian aggression at its Western border reaches a newfound high this weekend, NBC News Pentagon Correspondent Courtney Kube joins Chuck to detail the possible looming timeline of a 190,000-troop march up to Kyiv.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: As Russian aggression at its Western border reaches a newfound high this weekend, NBC News Pentagon Correspondent Courtney Kube joins Chuck to detail the possible looming timeline of a 190,000-troop march up to Kyiv.
